content: accessories zipper 15 cm 2 buttons 1 5 cm body back co 282 302 322 342 362 sts using col 1 and smaller cir needle = 135 145 153 163 171 sts work st st in the round for 3 cm and p 1 round to fold work border acc to diagram d back b&f starting at the arrow for your place a marker on each side with 141 151 161 171 181 sts size for the front and the back bobble for armhole on each side every 2nd row 2 1 1 1 1 1 sts for all change to larger needle and work border acc to diagram a sizes then bobble 1 st every 4th row all decrease 4 times = 113 123 131 start and end as marked for each size 141 149 sts work border acc to diagram b front and back then border acc to work until the armhole measures 21 5 22 22 5 23 23 5 cm diagram c front and back bobble center 49 49 49 51 51 sts for neck opening and finish each side separately decrease and increase on the sides as shown on the diagram on the neck side bobble 3 2 1 sts for all sizes on every other row on the last round bobble 6 6 8 8 10 sts = 3 3 4 4 5 sts to each side of at the same time work short row across the shoulders as follows each marker for armholes = 135 145 153 163 171 sts for each part start on the neck side and work until 6 7 8 9 10 sts rem turn sl1 finish the front and back separately work across continue working short row as est until 6 7 7 8 8 8 9 9 9 10 10 10 11 11 11 sts rem finally work 2 row using col 1 over all sts bobble work the other side the same but reverse shapings house of yarn | peace sweater dg1501 3 front = 135 145 153 163 171 sts work border b&f acc to diagram d front start at arrow for your size and bobble for armhole as the back = 113 123 131 141 149 sts at the st marked for front slit bobble the center st and finish each side separately right front = 56 61 65 70 74 sts co 1 st on the slit side this is an edge st and k at all times work until the front from the split measures 10 cm bobble 25 25 25 26 26 sts on the neck side cont to bobble on the neck side every other row 2 1 1 1 1 sts for all sizes = 26 31 35 39 43 shoulder sts center to determine where on the diagram to start shape the shoulder when the front measures the same as the back on the 2nd round m1 on each side of the marker repeat the increase every 1
